panels.description: Total GPU usage of all hosts

targets.expr: sum( sum(nvml_gpu_percent * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) by (node, device_id)) by (node)  / count(nvml_gpu_percent * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:) by(node)

panels.title: Total GPU utilization

targets.expr: sum(nvml_gpu_percent * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:{node=~"$host"}) / count(nvml_gpu_percent * on (namespace, pod) group_left(node) node_namespace_pod:kube_pod_info:{node=~"$host"})
